data.title: Celeste K. Fellner, DPM

Biography
Originally from Buffalo, New York, Dr. Celeste Fellner has lived and practiced in Cincinnati and Butler County since 1990. She joined Cincinnati Foot & Ankle Care in 1998 as one of the founding partners.

data.text:
Biography

Originally from Buffalo, New York, Dr. Celeste Fellner has lived and practiced in Cincinnati and Butler County since 1990. She joined Cincinnati Foot & Ankle Care in 1998 as one of the founding partners.

Dr. Fellner provides comprehensive foot and ankle care, including diabetic foot care, wound care, foot surgery, and endoscopic plantar fasciotomy. Other areas of interest include sports injuries as well conditions causing foot pain, such as heel pain, ingrown and fungal nails, bunions and hammertoes.

Within the community, Dr. Fellner is active in Unbound, a mission group that partners with families bound by poverty to promote empowerment.

In her free time, Dr. Fellner enjoys outdoor activities with her husband and partner in practice, Dr. Nickolas Minnie, as well as her three daughters, hiking and participating in cross-training fitness including yoga and Pilates. As an art advocate, she also enjoys painting, playing the piano, and attending live music venues.

Professional Background

Board Certified by the American Board of Foot and Ankle Surgery

Residency: Podiatric Medicine and Surgery, Doctorâ€™s Hospital, Houston, TX, 1989

Doctor of Podiatric Medicine: Ohio College of Podiatric Medicine, Independence, OH, 1988

Undergraduate Degree: Canisius College, Buffalo, NY

Professional Involvement & Recognition
